__TOC__


=== Objectives ===

This team focuses the gathering and organizing of links to the most common how-tos and making them easily available to the Ubuntu users in Oklahoma and OklahomaTeam members. This team will also be the front-line support to the Ubuntu users of Oklahoma and OklahomaTeam Members.

If you have any questions, contact the team leader.

=== ToDo List ===

{*} Create a support queue for Ubuntu users of Oklahoma?<<BR>>
{*} Create pamphlet to hand out with CDs.<<BR>>
{*} Build a knowledge base.
Feel free to add any ideas.
